mapper.update: UPDATE studygroup_info SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, recruitmentType = #{recruitmentType}, wayOfProceeding = #{wayOfProceeding}, numberOfRecruits = #{numberOfRecruits}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, deadlineForRecruitment = #{deadlineForRecruitment} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studygroup_info(managementSeq, title, contents, recruitmentType, wayOfProceeding, numberOfRecruits, startDate, endDate, deadlineForRecruitment) VALUES (#{managementSeq}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{recruitmentType}, #{wayOfProceeding}, #{numberOfRecruits}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{deadlineForRecruitment})
mapper.select: SELECT managementSeq FROM studygroup_info si JOIN studygroup_management sm ON si.managementSeq = sm.seq WHERE sm.isClosed = false AND si.deadlineForRecruitment < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP();
